pages.text: This Rite will engrave the $(marked)Internal Feasting$() Spell into the caster's mind.

The Rite for learning this spell requires a lesser amount of Focal Power; the Internal Feasting Spell will, as the name suggests, feed the caster with their own flesh and a bit of additional power. This will cost health, but will decrease hunger. The actual effect takes place as it is cast; the Spell cannot be cast when there is no need for it. $(br2)This Spell should under no circumstances be cast when the caster has low health.
